@org.junit.jupiter.api.Test
void shouldThrowExceptionOnInvalidPath() {
    // The following line was generated by AI
    org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertThrows(com.artipie.http.ArtipieException.class, () -> new com.artipie.docker.http.UploadEntityRequest(new com.artipie.asto.test.TestResource("invalid"), "user"));
